sentences.en: A lighter touch around town would accentuate the Q 5's smaller size and cut - and - thrust ability.
sentences.cn: 在城镇周围行驶时操控更显轻盈,这将更能体现出Q5尺寸的娇小和性能的卓越.

sentences.en: Accentuate: Use lip liner after putting on your lipstick . Kiss - able !
sentences.cn: 突出: 涂完 唇膏 以后画唇线,轮廓更突出,更诱人.

sentences.en: Additionally, you can magnify a funny line by using the pause to accentuate your physical delivery.
sentences.cn: 另外, 你还可以使用肢体语言增强停顿的效果从而增强妙语的效果.

sentences.en: But global warming is bound to accentuate the scarcity , say experts.
sentences.cn: 而且,全球暖化现象还会加速缺水问题的恶化.

sentences.en: Gibberellic acid may also accentuate the trend toward maleness.
sentences.cn: 赤霉酸也可加强雄性的倾向.

sentences.en: In patients suffering from shock, the drug may accentuate the underlying disorder.
sentences.cn: 对休克患者, 该药可加重潜在性疾.

sentences.en: Is acupuncture cure sciatica good? Can you accentuate inflammation department of gynaecology?
sentences.cn: 针灸治疗坐骨神经痛好不好? 会不会加重妇科炎症?

sentences.en: It helps accentuate my curls, and It'smells great.
sentences.cn: 它帮我的卷发看起来更自然卷曲, 而且很好闻.

sentences.en: Lighting and material details accentuate the ripple effect.
sentences.cn: 照明设备和材料的细节加剧的连锁反应.

sentences.en: Lips Accentuate your new bluesy beat in simply sensational LipSlicks Hint of Mauve.
sentences.cn: 为了强调新布鲁斯乐的节奏,涂上紫红色的唇彩是最自然的.

sentences.en: She has beautiful eyes, so we should accentuate them in the makeup.
sentences.cn: 她眼睛很美丽, 我们在化妆时应该突出她的眼睛.

sentences.en: The photograph seemed to accentuate his large nose.
sentences.cn: 照片似乎突出了他的大鼻子。
